name: n_bact
description: Number of E. Coli bacteria simulated

name: box_x
description: Elongation of Simulation box in x-direciton

name: box_y
description: Elongation of Simulation box in y-direciton

name: grad_type
description: Type of gradient-function. Possible: 0 exp, 1 lin

name: grad_x0
description: Gradient parameters, used in code to define gradient

name: gam_R
description: Rate of methylation in dm/dt, actually = 0.0069

name: gam_B
description: Rate of demethylation in dm/dt, act = 0.12

name: K_off_tsr
description: Dissociation constant for off-state of receptor Tsr

name: K_on_tsr
description: Dissociation constant for on-state of receptor Tsr

name: K_off_tar
description: Dissociation constant for off-state of receptor Tar

name: K_on_tar
description: Dissociation constant for on-state of receptor Tar

name: Z_tot
description: Total Concentration of CheZ, look at kZ unit

name: save_intervall
description: After every x steps, the positions are written in the output file

name: n_recep
description: Number of receptors in a cluster
